sauces.name: Soy Sauce
sauces.description: A liquid condiment of Chinese origin, traditionally made from a fermented paste of soybeans, roasted grain, brine, and Aspergillus oryzae or Aspergillus sojae molds.

sauces.name: Syrup
sauces.description: A sweet condiment. Buying or selling it in Maple Run unlocks the 'Everyone's Just So Polite, Eh?' achievement.

sauces.name: Salsa
sauces.description: A variety of sauces used as condiments for tacos and other Mexican and Mexican-American foods, and as dips for tortilla chips.

sauces.name: Guacamole
sauces.description: An avocado-based dip, spread, or salad first developed by the Aztecs in what is now Mexico.

spreads.name: Butter
spreads.description: A dairy product made from the fat and protein components of churned cream.

spreads.name: Nut Butter
spreads.description: A spreadable foodstuff made by grinding nuts into a paste.

spreads.name: Algae Paste
spreads.description: A nutritious, if not particularly appetizing, paste made from algae.

condiments.name: Mayonnaise
condiments.description: A thick cold condiment or dressing commonly used in sandwiches and composed salads.

condiments.name: Ketchup
condiments.description: A sweet and tangy sauce typically made from tomatoes, sweetener, and vinegar, with assorted seasonings and spices.
